channel.title: Couple questions on a 637 server :D
channel.description: 1. how do i make people mod etc 2. nex takes about 30mins to respawn how do i make it respawn say 30 seconds after killing

item.title: Couple questions on a 637 server :D
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

ive little experience with 637s but if its a dementium go to your source/src/org/dementhium/net/action sender.java
then press ctrl +f and search setRights(2);
above that there should be a name in brackets example:
if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“cog”))
player.getDefinition().setRights(2);
change the part where it says cog
idk how to change the nex timer though sorry

Read full topic
